title: Who Killed Mr. GoodBar?
description: The scandal that shook Candy Land! Joe Goodbar and Amanda (Almond) Joy appeared to be the ideal couple. However, things aren't always smooth like chocolate and coconuts. From his association with notorious gangsters Mike and Ike, his extramarital affairs with mistresses Katherine (KitKat) and secretary Mrs. Airhead, to the embezzlement of 100 Grand, everyone is pondering: Who Killed Mr. Goodbar?
